author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5189: method call expression should propagate exchange properties and message headers, so we can support stateful EIPs such as dynamic router etc. This is also consistent what we do in with other EIPs and components.

msg: QPID-3959: ensure the test creates/removes its own ApplicationRegistry with a null AuthenticationManager.
